int RTRString::indexOf (  char  c,
int  p1
)  [inherited]
 

The index of the first instance c found in this string after position p1
REQUIRE: p1 >= lower()
REQUIRE: p1 <= upper()
ENSURE : result >= lower() implies operator[](result) == c
